description: One of the Doll Knights, who controls courage. Transform into Super Doll Isamu . The image color is blue. It is the only man, and even physical power surpasses Dorica. When the person who wears the blue calling ring calls or when a crisis approaches, a pocket watch type calling watch illuminates and activates by casting a spell. It has a large sword- type weapon "Light Thunder". If you pierce the ground, shock waves will occur and ground cracking and running will occur. It is also possible to concentrate the power on the blade and release it as a beam.
name: Doll Isamu
